'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Sword}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Trivia 

* Functionally identical to an [Exceptional Sword](/exceptionalSwordDeadfire/).
* Internal name makes it seem unique, but it isn't a unique sword, nor does it have any unique enchantments.
* It's likely that this sword cannot obtained in-game. <sup>Needs verification</sup>
